summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in blocks 29, 30, and 31, Plan of North Seattle, and block 32, D.T. Denny's Home Addition, being the alley from Denny Way to Republican Street, between Warren Avenue and 1st Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9535 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
